alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 4:20PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Harrison and Jackson Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hurley to 10 miles north of Latimer. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Martin, Escatawpa, D`iberville, Wade, Latimer, Big Point, Hurley, Vancleave and Gulf Hills. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 46 and 53. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 3 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson
